page.title: 07FAMILY LIFE 4.
page.content: My children's other hobbies are dancing-they go to ballet and tap dancing lessons in Hamstreet Victory Hall one evening per week after school-Brownies- my eldest daughter attends this once a week in Ruckinge. My youngest daughter is also looking forward to going but there is an age limit and she cannot start until she is 7 years old. Playing the piano(they are both having lessons),the flute(my eldest daughter is having lessons at school) and horse riding(again they are both having lessons). Our eldest daughter is also learning to play Netball at school which she enjoys very much.
